project.title: hr-recruitment-website
project.name: HR Recruitment Website
project.description: A web application designed to streamline the recruitment process, enabling HR teams to manage job postings, applications, and candidate profiles efficiently.

contributions.content: Developed the front-end interface for job seekers and HR staff using ReactJS.
Implemented a secure login system with role-based access for administrators and applicants.
Integrated MongoDB for managing job postings and candidate data.
Designed a responsive user interface to improve usability across devices.

project.title: approval-hub
project.name: RYS Approval Hub
project.description: An approval workflow system to centralize and automate the approval of internal requests, reducing processing times and improving efficiency.

contributions.content: Collaborated with the team to design and implement an approval pipeline for multiple departments.
Developed APIs for managing approval requests and routing decisions using Node.js.
Set up a PostgreSQL database for secure and efficient data storage.
Conducted thorough testing to ensure smooth workflow automation.

project.title: request-for-payment
project.name: Request For Payment
project.description: A payment request management system for submitting, tracking, and processing internal payment requests.

contributions.content: Built the back-end logic for tracking payment request statuses using Laravel.
Designed and implemented a user-friendly interface with Vue.js for submitting and monitoring requests.
Developed a notification system to alert approvers of pending requests.
Optimized database queries to ensure efficient processing of large volumes of data.

project.title: business-trip
project.name: Official Business Trip / OB and Trip Ticket QR Scanner
project.description: An organization-wide application for managing and tracking official business trips of all employees.

contributions.content: Developed the backend logic for generating and managing delivery dockets.
Designed an intuitive user interface for drivers and logistics personnel.
Integrated real-time updates to track delivery statuses.
Optimized database queries to enhance performance with large shipment records.

project.title: leave-application
project.name: RYS Leave Application
project.description: A leave management platform for employees to apply for, track, and manage their leaves with approval workflows.

contributions.content: Developed RESTful APIs for leave requests and approvals using Django.
Created a ReactJS-based dashboard for employees and managers to manage leave applications.
Integrated email notifications for leave status updates.
Implemented a calendar view for better visualization of leave schedules.

project.title: ticketing-system
project.name: Ticket System
project.description: An internal IT support ticketing system to track and resolve employee-reported technical issues.

contributions.content: Designed and developed ticket submission and tracking modules using ASP.NET Core.
Built a reporting feature to analyze ticket resolution times and trends.
Implemented a priority-based system for categorizing and resolving tickets efficiently.
Integrated authentication for users and support staff with role-based access.

project.title: docket-system
project.name: Docket System
project.description: A web-based application for managing and tracking delivery dockets, ensuring accuracy and transparency in shipment tracking.

contributions.content: Developed the back-end logic for generating and managing delivery dockets.
Designed an intuitive interface for drivers and logistics personnel.
Integrated real-time updates for tracking delivery statuses.
Optimized database queries for high performance with large shipment records.
